requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - University degree in Technical majors.
              
              - From 23 - 35 years old
              
              - Minimum 2 years’ experience in detailed drawings of wooden products (outdoor & indoor).
              
              - Rich knowledge & experience in wood processing procedure, quality control, container loading calculation.
              
              - Good at ACAD, 3D Max, Corel, Photoshop, Inventor, Solidworks..
              
              - Fluent English speaking & writing.
              
              - Physically strong
              
              - Honest, creative, meticulous, well-organized, self-motivated, keen on product building, improvement & perfection, fully committed to the tasks given, able to work in team and under pressure.
              
              - Good computer skills.
              

              Request:
              
              - CV in English with photo
              
              - Application Letter.
